plot: Mawla is from Bangladesh and lives in Madrid. He has a job and a lot of friends but his dream is to have a family. For the first time in seven years, he decides to go back to his country and look for a wife.
title: La boda de Mawla
plot_es: Mawla is from Bangladesh and lives in Madrid. He has a job and a lot of friends but his dream is to have a family. For the first time in seven years, he decides to go back to his country and look for a wife.
plot_en: Mawla is from Bangladesh and lives in Madrid. He has a job and a lot of friends but his dream is to have a family. For the first time in seven years, he decides to go back to his country and look for a wife.
